Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_EASY) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_1) and PROFILEMAN:IsPersistentProfile(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()
